title: The origins of civilisation
itunes:title: The origins of civilisation
itunes:subtitle: Yale political scientist James C Scott talks to us about his new book, Against the Grain, which explores some of the key questions around early agriculture and state-building.
description:
Yale political scientist James C Scott talks to us about his new book, Against the Grain, which explores some of the key questions around early agriculture and state-building.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
